<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===-------- PPCELFStreamer.cpp - ELF Object Output ---------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is a custom MCELFStreamer for PowerPC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The purpose of the custom ELF streamer is to allow us to intercept</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions as they are being emitted and align all 8 byte instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to a 64 byte boundary if required (by adding a 4 byte nop). This is important</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because 8 byte instructions are not allowed to cross 64 byte boundaries</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and by aliging anything that is within 4 bytes of the boundary we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// guarantee that the 8 byte instructions do not cross that boundary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/lib/target/powerpc/mctargetdesc/ppcelfstreamer-h">PPCELFStreamer.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/lib/target/powerpc/mctargetdesc/ppcmccodeemitter-h">PPCMCCodeEmitter.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/lib/target/powerpc/mctargetdesc/ppcmctargetdesc-h">PPCMCTargetDesc.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/binaryformat/elf-h">llvm/BinaryFormat/ELF.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcasmbackend-h">llvm/MC/MCAsmBackend.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcelfstreamer/#ac558199bf4ba000421543f08b7adf8f0"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcelfstreamer/#ac558199bf4ba000421543f08b7adf8f0">PPCELFStreamer::PPCELFStreamer</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp;Context,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MCAsmBackend&gt; MAB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MCObjectWriter&gt; OW,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MCCodeEmitter&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxcontainerglobals-cpp/#a4e37c99d7f846fd82966c68def83c4fc">Emitter</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlight">    : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcelfstreamer/#aec09c5b9322b90f034d51bd3c0903563">MCELFStreamer</a>(Context, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std">std</a>::<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfc9c7ecf70f66901e439f7c04ef3dbb">move</a>(MAB), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std">std</a>::<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfc9c7ecf70f66901e439f7c04ef3dbb">move</a>(OW), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std">std</a>::<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfc9c7ecf70f66901e439f7c04ef3dbb">move</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxcontainerglobals-cpp/#a4e37c99d7f846fd82966c68def83c4fc">Emitter</a>)),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastLabel(nullptr) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCELFStreamer::emitPrefixedInstruction(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;Inst,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;STI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prefixed instructions must not cross a 64-byte boundary (i.e. prefix is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before the boundary and the remaining 4-bytes are after the boundary). In</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order to achieve this, a nop is added prior to any such boundary-crossing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prefixed instruction. Align to 64 bytes if possible but add a maximum of 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bytes when trying to do that. If alignment requires adding more than 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bytes then the instruction won&#39;t be aligned. When emitting a code alignment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a new fragment is created for this alignment. This fragment will contain</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all of the nops required as part of the alignment operation. In the cases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when no nops are added then The fragment is still created but it remains</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// empty.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectstreamer/#ad6394338481d436a665bb4572e9e1ffc">emitCodeAlignment</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(64), &amp;STI, 4);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since the previous emit created a new fragment then adding this instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// also forces the addition of a new fragment. Inst is now the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction in that new fragment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectstreamer/#a92d2d1c2ac97f1151ed8f38d854e8b34">MCELFStreamer::emitInstruction</a>(Inst, STI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The above instruction is forced to start a new fragment because it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// comes after a code alignment fragment. Get that new fragment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfragment">MCFragment</a> &#42;InstructionFragment = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a2f9393965bc0de69da6236c623f79579">getCurrentFragment</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> InstLoc = Inst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#a40c7fb73978096ed317dd71fb8a84cf4">getLoc</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if there was a last label emitted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastLabel &amp;&amp; !LastLabel-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol/#ad829c4f6666903fc66490cd4b5445eae">isUnset</a>() &amp;&amp; LastLabelLoc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc/#abb1e94b8fff61f549bcbd5a2780f6796">isValid</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InstLoc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc/#abb1e94b8fff61f549bcbd5a2780f6796">isValid</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sourcemgr">SourceMgr</a> &#42;SourceManager = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a61c979932b890df773ce75013b76708b">getContext</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext/#aa0238c5455430b5bef943138b198e522">getSourceManager</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstLine = SourceManager-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sourcemgr/#af84919a22333087fc39465b1826a8208">FindLineNumber</a>(InstLoc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LabelLine = SourceManager-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sourcemgr/#af84919a22333087fc39465b1826a8208">FindLineNumber</a>(LastLabelLoc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the Label and the Instruction are on the same line then move the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// label to the top of the fragment containing the aligned instruction that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// was just added.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InstLine == LabelLine) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastLabel-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol/#a59bf6e97f0f02573b74d322186c91327">setFragment</a>(InstructionFragment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastLabel-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol/#abb9ae52dad6d9d0840fce1109f46c953">setOffset</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcelfstreamer/#abd418120b6155f0727d4bbf2dfeafe97"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcelfstreamer/#abd418120b6155f0727d4bbf2dfeafe97">PPCELFStreamer::emitInstruction</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;Inst,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;STI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcmccodeemitter">PPCMCCodeEmitter</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxcontainerglobals-cpp/#a4e37c99d7f846fd82966c68def83c4fc">Emitter</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcmccodeemitter">PPCMCCodeEmitter</a>&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectstreamer/#a3e9a3c0090b1184f7371fa5ad4ce57c9">getAssembler</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler/#a751b495bbd855f8fa28e98a3619c898a">getEmitterPtr</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the instruction is a part of the GOT to PC-Rel link time optimization</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction pair, return a value, otherwise return std::nullopt. A true</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// returned value means the instruction is the PLDpc and a false value means</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it is the user instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;bool&gt; IsPartOfGOTToPCRelPair =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adc6a276f0a40e983e11fe851e818ad01">isPartOfGOTToPCRelPair</a>(Inst, STI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// User of the GOT-indirect address.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, the load that will get the relocation as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .reloc .Lpcrel1-8,R&#95;PPC64&#95;PCREL&#95;OPT,.-(.Lpcrel1-8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  lwa 3, 4(3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsPartOfGOTToPCRelPair &amp;&amp; !&#42;IsPartOfGOTToPCRelPair)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    emitGOTToPCRelReloc(Inst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Special handling is only for prefixed instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxcontainerglobals-cpp/#a4e37c99d7f846fd82966c68def83c4fc">Emitter</a>-&gt;isPrefixedInstruction(Inst)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectstreamer/#a92d2d1c2ac97f1151ed8f38d854e8b34">MCELFStreamer::emitInstruction</a>(Inst, STI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  emitPrefixedInstruction(Inst, STI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Producer of the GOT-indirect address.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, the prefixed load from the got that will get the label as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  pld 3, vec@got@pcrel(0), 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .Lpcrel1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsPartOfGOTToPCRelPair &amp;&amp; &#42;IsPartOfGOTToPCRelPair)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    emitGOTToPCRelLabel(Inst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcelfstreamer/#ad765ad35ceb5fb06da044f0f4d365a3b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcelfstreamer/#ad765ad35ceb5fb06da044f0f4d365a3b">PPCELFStreamer::emitLabel</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;Symbol, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LastLabel = Symbol;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LastLabelLoc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcelfstreamer/#ac725449b95138e5297b8af02df828882">MCELFStreamer::emitLabel</a>(Symbol);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This linker time GOT PC Relative optimization relocation will look like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   pld &lt;reg&gt; symbol@got@pcrel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;Label###&gt;:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   .reloc Label###-8,R&#95;PPC64&#95;PCREL&#95;OPT,.-(Label###-8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   load &lt;loadedreg&gt;, 0(&lt;reg&gt;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The reason we place the label after the PLDpc instruction is that there</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may be an alignment nop before it since prefixed instructions must not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cross a 64-byte boundary (please see</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PPCELFStreamer::emitPrefixedInstruction()). When referring to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// label, we subtract the width of a prefixed instruction (8 bytes) to ensure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we refer to the PLDpc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCELFStreamer::emitGOTToPCRelReloc(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;Inst) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the last operand which contains the symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> &amp;Operand = Inst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#aef5de3ac30fe221c5b4e702574ab46a9">getOperand</a>(Inst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#a3c5c7109f398fdca515509e2284cd8c0">getNumOperands</a>() - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Operand.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#ae23b2e8269fe15dbe5ebb3394438960c">isExpr</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting an MCExpr.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cast the last operand to MCSymbolRefExpr to get the symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42;Expr = Operand.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#ac9408fbc60922d24b01c1efcbd4ba52b">getExpr</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr">MCSymbolRefExpr</a> &#42;SymExpr = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr">MCSymbolRefExpr</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Expr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SymExpr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr/#ad860e326e495f296cdee70606908a6b1">getKind</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr/#a5c463f6352570ee778c35c40949c4985a0e7a0e61e9e2418f5a362d17b4c1c6c9">MCSymbolRefExpr::VK&#95;PPC&#95;PCREL&#95;OPT</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting a symbol of type VK&#95;PPC&#95;PCREL&#95;OPT&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;LabelSym =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a61c979932b890df773ce75013b76708b">getContext</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext/#ac11eef690074972378846024abbe8722">getOrCreateSymbol</a>(SymExpr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr/#a048f077746d95f142d02e56586862bf2">getSymbol</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol/#a57c7b2b9784361914262eeb0a6f0b18d">getName</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SubExpr is just Label###-8</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit the label that immediately follows the PLDpc for a link time GOT PC Rel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimization.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCELFStreamer::emitGOTToPCRelLabel(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;Inst) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the last operand which contains the symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> &amp;Operand = Inst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#aef5de3ac30fe221c5b4e702574ab46a9">getOperand</a>(Inst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#a3c5c7109f398fdca515509e2284cd8c0">getNumOperands</a>() - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Operand.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#ae23b2e8269fe15dbe5ebb3394438960c">isExpr</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting an MCExpr.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cast the last operand to MCSymbolRefExpr to get the symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42;Expr = Operand.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#ac9408fbc60922d24b01c1efcbd4ba52b">getExpr</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr">MCSymbolRefExpr</a> &#42;SymExpr = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr">MCSymbolRefExpr</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Expr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SymExpr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr/#ad860e326e495f296cdee70606908a6b1">getKind</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr/#a5c463f6352570ee778c35c40949c4985a0e7a0e61e9e2418f5a362d17b4c1c6c9">MCSymbolRefExpr::VK&#95;PPC&#95;PCREL&#95;OPT</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting a symbol of type VK&#95;PPC&#95;PCREL&#95;OPT&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;LabelSym =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a61c979932b890df773ce75013b76708b">getContext</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext/#ac11eef690074972378846024abbe8722">getOrCreateSymbol</a>(SymExpr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr/#a048f077746d95f142d02e56586862bf2">getSymbol</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol/#a57c7b2b9784361914262eeb0a6f0b18d">getName</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcelfstreamer/#ad765ad35ceb5fb06da044f0f4d365a3b">emitLabel</a>(LabelSym, Inst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#a40c7fb73978096ed317dd71fb8a84cf4">getLoc</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function checks if the parameter Inst is part of the setup for a link</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// time GOT PC Relative optimization. For example in this situation:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;MCInst PLDpc &lt;MCOperand Reg:282&gt; &lt;MCOperand Expr:(glob&#95;double@got@pcrel)&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &lt;MCOperand Imm:0&gt; &lt;MCOperand Expr:(.Lpcrel@&lt;&lt;invalid&gt;&gt;)&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;MCInst SOME&#95;LOAD &lt;MCOperand Reg:22&gt; &lt;MCOperand Imm:0&gt; &lt;MCOperand Reg:282&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &lt;MCOperand Expr:(.Lpcrel@&lt;&lt;invalid&gt;&gt;)&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The above is a pair of such instructions and this function will not return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// std::nullopt for either one of them. In both cases we are looking for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// last operand &lt;MCOperand Expr:(.Lpcrel@&lt;&lt;invalid&gt;&gt;)&gt; which needs to be an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MCExpr and has the flag MCSymbolRefExpr::VK&#95;PPC&#95;PCREL&#95;OPT. After that we just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// look at the opcode and in the case of PLDpc we will return true. For the load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (or store) this function will return false indicating it has found the second</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruciton in the pair.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adc6a276f0a40e983e11fe851e818ad01"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;bool&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adc6a276f0a40e983e11fe851e818ad01">llvm::isPartOfGOTToPCRelPair</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;Inst,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;STI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Need at least two operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Inst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#a3c5c7109f398fdca515509e2284cd8c0">getNumOperands</a>() &lt; 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastOp = Inst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#a3c5c7109f398fdca515509e2284cd8c0">getNumOperands</a>() - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The last operand needs to be an MCExpr and it needs to have a variant kind</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of VK&#95;PPC&#95;PCREL&#95;OPT. If it does not satisfy these conditions it is not a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// link time GOT PC Rel opt instruction and we can ignore it and return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// std::nullopt.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> &amp;Operand = Inst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#aef5de3ac30fe221c5b4e702574ab46a9">getOperand</a>(LastOp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Operand.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#ae23b2e8269fe15dbe5ebb3394438960c">isExpr</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for the variant kind VK&#95;PPC&#95;PCREL&#95;OPT in this expression.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42;Expr = Operand.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#ac9408fbc60922d24b01c1efcbd4ba52b">getExpr</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr">MCSymbolRefExpr</a> &#42;SymExpr = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr">MCSymbolRefExpr</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Expr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SymExpr || SymExpr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr/#ad860e326e495f296cdee70606908a6b1">getKind</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr/#a5c463f6352570ee778c35c40949c4985a0e7a0e61e9e2418f5a362d17b4c1c6c9">MCSymbolRefExpr::VK&#95;PPC&#95;PCREL&#95;OPT</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Inst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#a5c26b1db954c27889986dba3b310a8e4">getOpcode</a>() == PPC::PLDpc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac864eaef71f8fa49cc3ee232b0cb0269"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcelfstreamer">MCELFStreamer</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac864eaef71f8fa49cc3ee232b0cb0269">llvm::createPPCELFStreamer</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp;Context, std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MCAsmBackend&gt; MAB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MCObjectWriter&gt; OW,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MCCodeEmitter&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxcontainerglobals-cpp/#a4e37c99d7f846fd82966c68def83c4fc">Emitter</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">new</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcelfstreamer">PPCELFStreamer</a>(Context, std::move(MAB), std::move(OW),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            std::move(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxcontainerglobals-cpp/#a4e37c99d7f846fd82966c68def83c4fc">Emitter</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
